long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you love a good quote? 🖋

Sometimes you just need the right words to make it through the day and reading an amazing motivational quote can really do the trick. 💙

With Quote, a good quote in a breathtaking design is only a single click away! 💻

Quotes are so powerful. They can motivate you 💪, calm you down 🧘‍♀‍🧘, make you smile 😃, or even remind you to be grateful for all the good things in your life 💕. 

Our Chrome Extension was made to provide you with beautiful, high-quality quotes the moment that you need them!


Motivation
A good motivational quote can carry you through any hardship. 😎 Whether you need motivation to absolutely kill it in your next meeting 👩‍💼or just to get up and go to the gym in the morning 🏋️‍♀‍, Quote has your back.

Motivating Quotes Can:
●	Hype You Up For A Presentation 🗣
●	Give You The Mental Clarity To Finish Your Homework 📚 
●	Get You Moving 🏋️
●	Keep You Focused 🧠 
●	Improve Your Attitude 😆

Inspiration
Inspiring quotes are the perfect way to get through the day. 😁 It doesn’t matter if you’re working on your new book 📖 or you just want to chase down a new hobby 🤺, inspirational quotes can support your efforts.

Inspirational Quotes Can:
●	Help You Dream Bigger 💭 
●	Boost Your Creativity 🌈 
●	Generate New Ideas 💡 

Friendship
Everyone loves their friends 👥 and sometimes we need a good way to support them. ♥️ Friendship quotes can help you feel connected to your friends, even when they are halfway around the globe 🌎. Show them that you care with the perfect BFF quote!

Friendship Quotes Can:
●	Remind Someone You Love Them 💜 
●	Help You Feel Supported 🤗 
●	Make You Smile 😊 

Love
Love is worth a thousand words and many great minds have come up with them. 💗 Fortunately, we give you easy access to the best love quotes so that you can always remember to smile when you think about your boo. 😍 The right quotes can help you learn, feel closer to your significant other, and make you smile like crazy! 😆

Love Quotes Can:
●	Show Someone You Care ❤️
●	Get You Inspired For A Date Night 🧡
●	Help You Feel Closer To Your Significant Other 💛
●	Make You Feel All Warm and Fuzzy 💚
●	Remind You Of Your Worth 💙
●	Make You Fall In Love All Over Again 💜

Self-Love
A relationship is great, but self-love is so important. Do you ever feel down on yourself? 😞 Do you ever treat yourself unfairly or think negative thoughts? 😢 Self-love quotes remind you to look within and love yourself!

Self-Love Quotes Can:
●	Remind You You’re Worth It 😌
●	Support You Through A Hard Time 😳
●	Help You Love Yourself More 🥰
●	Show You What Makes You Awesome 🤩

The right quote can change any mindset. Let us provide you with amazing quotes in awesome styles that you will love to share on social media!
